name: Caroline's Fantasies
description:
Caroline's Fantasies is a real-time-3D Interactive Erotic Story about a beautiful college coed who is selected to Beta Test a new VIRTUAL SEXUAL EXPERIENCE SYSTEM. This system brings her sexiest, naughtiest and even her darkest sexual fantasies to life. Caroline has a wild and vivid sexual imagination, and you get to participate as each separate fantasy comes to life in real-time 3D.
Be there as Caroline experiences the thrill of living out her wildest sexual dreams and desires. Each of Caroline’s Sexual Fantasies is its own separate Erotic short story, with its own interactive experiences, like swimming naked in a beautiful cove with her best friend, or walking through a dark, creepy forest while being stalked by a lust-crazed werewolf.
Caroline’s Fantasies is truly next-generation interactive erotic fiction, with full-Realtime 3D graphics and complete, top-quality voice acting throughout. Take control of the intensity and other features of the sexual action as Caroline’s fantasies expand from simple solo-experiences to wild and even supernatural sexual encounters.
This interactive Erotic Story features 12 extremely immersive, interactive sexual experiences that grow in pleasure and intensity as the story progresses. From simple one-on-one encounters with real people in Caroline’s life, to fantastical, fairy-tale based sexual experiences with supernatural creatures, Caroline’s sexual imagination is truly wild and extraordinary.
This Amazing Interactive Erotic Adventure features:
An engaging story that sees a sweet young woman experience the joy of having her innermost sexual fantasies brought to reality.Full English voice-over by a number of talented professional Erotic Voice Actresses and Actors, including hours of voice content by the amazingly talented and Insanely-Sexy Mia Sloane as CarolineThe ability to control the intensity of each sexual experience, along with a number of other features like the time-of-day, clothing options, point of view and moreFull English SubtitlesThe ability to play through and re-live every erotic scene over and over from a “scenes” menu.
